mapper.insert: insert into cart_cart(user_id, commodity_id, sku_id, number, create_by, create_time) values (#{userId}, #{commodityId}, #{skuId}, #{number}, #{createBy}, #{createTime});
mapper.update: update cart_cart set revision=revision + 1 where revision = 0 and id = #{id};
mapper.select: select id, user_id, commodity_id, sku_id, number, revision, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, is_effective from cart_cart where id = #{id};

select cart.sku_id, cart.number, commodity.shop_name, commodity.name as commodityName, commodity.img_url, sku.value_index as attributeIndex, sku.price from cart_cart cart left outer join cart_commodity commodity on cart.commodity_id = commodity.id left outer join cart_sku sku on cart.sku_id = sku.id where cart.user_id = #{userId};
